overview.en: Public Financial Trade Chain (abbr. PFT) leverages PFT token as its medium to build a global financial trading cloud platform with deep infusion of applications and commercial uses on financial industry and financial ecosystem chain based on smart contract and crypto token system.
overview.zh: Public Financial Trade Chain以PFT Token（简称PFT）为媒介，利用区块链技术，结合金融产业和金融生态链上的应用和商业场景，基于智能合约和Token系统，打造的一个全球金融交易云智能平台。
